name: Glitch--;
description:
Game made during the Global Game Jam 2020 on the theme repair

Controls:

Movements: WASD or arrow keys

Primary shoot: right click or space bar

Secondary shoot (when unlocked) : right click

Lore:

The Beug&Pahfini studio are in a bad situtation: their game is full of bugs. Help them repair it to allow them to launch it

Credits: Sound Design, Game Design and Art:

Laurent Frering

Programming and Game Design:

Vivien Fargette

Source code : https://github.com/ViviFar/GGJ20
